message:
Man rescues 8-year-old girl during attempted kidnapping at North Carolina restaurant. 
#EverydayHero

data.description: GREENSBORO, N.C. (WGHP)-- A good Samaritan will enjoy free breakfast for a year after rescuing an 8-year-old girl from a potential kidnapper. Cody Byrd, a North Carolina A&T University graduate student studying computer science, is being praised as a hero after he stepped in when a man, Timothy Fry,...
data.title: Man rescues 8-year-old girl during attempted kidnapping at North Carolina restaurant
